channel.title: Hitboxes of HEV zombies on legs are wierd
channel.description: So, HEV zombies invulnerable to bullets while shooting in body but not in head, seems work as designed. Well, with legs if you shooting in right leg, it's still invulnerable but if in left leg, it's not. It looks like damage shouldn't be dealt because it's part of the legs but I don't really know. ![bm_bug_zev|690x388,75%](upload://n1HjU80NioIc3F7DVP8D4kPnZd9.jpeg) Blue sparks showcase what damage have been dealt.

item.title: Hitboxes of HEV zombies on legs are wierd
item.dc:creator: jerzyn
item.description:
If you talking about hole on the right leg, it’s because of shooting in it. Also left leg is vulnerable to damage.

item.title: Hitboxes of HEV zombies on legs are wierd
item.dc:creator: jerzyn
item.description:
So, HEV zombies invulnerable to bullets while shooting in body but not in head, seems work as designed. Well, with legs if you shooting in right leg, it’s still invulnerable but if in left leg, it’s not. It looks like damage shouldn’t be dealt because it’s part of the legs but I don’t really know.

bm_bug_zev1920×1080 287 KB

Blue sparks showcase what damage have been dealt.

Read full topic
